title: 81/569/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Medical systems - neurophore BH-2; - mini frame PPS-2' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "Medical systems - neurophore BH-2 ; - mini frame PPS-2" may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/569/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Medical systems - neurophore BH-2 ; - mini frame PPS-2" which are the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 19 December 1980 may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
